Key.Original: Personal Digital Assistant. A mini-computer that contains personal notes, maps and allows text messaging. An item carried by every respectable stalker.
Key.English: Personal Digital Assistant. A mini-computer that contains personal notes, maps and allows text messaging. An item carried by every respectable stalker.
Key.Russian: Карманный Персональный Компьютер. Содержит в себе песрональные записи, карты местонсти, а также позволяет обмен текстовыми сообщениями. Предмет каждого уважающего себя сталкера.

Key.Original: Vodka - a simple and cheap way for stalkers to get rid of radiation. Don't drink too much though.
Key.English: Vodka - a simple and cheap way for stalkers to get rid of radiation. Don't drink too much though.
Key.Russian: Водка - простой и дешёвый средство вывода радиации, используемый сталкерами. Злоупотреблять ей однако не стоит.

Key.Original: Configuration of dynamic mutants spawn. Must be synchronized with one or more triggers. Applies to all synchronized triggers and their mutants modules.
Key.English: Configuration of dynamic mutants spawn. Must be synchronized with one or more triggers. Applies to all synchronized triggers and their mutants modules.
Key.Russian: Конфигурация динамического спавна мутантов. Должен быть синхронизирован с одним или более триггеров. Настройки распространяются на все синхронизированные триггеры и их модули мутантов.

Key.Original: Fields of trigger can be taken/executed: activation expression, position, radius.
Key.English: Fields of trigger can be taken/executed: activation expression, position, radius.
Key.Russian: Поля триггера могут быть учтены/выполнены: условие, активация, деактивация, позиция, радиус.

Key.Original:
Configuration of monsters class.
Must be synchronized with the trigger
Key.English:
Configuration of monsters class.
Must be synchronized with the trigger
Key.Russian:
Конфигурация класса существ.
Должен быть синхронизирован с триггером

Key.Original: This setting sets the spawned unit ownership. Ownership determines what machine the unit is local to.
Key.English: This setting sets the spawned unit ownership. Ownership determines what machine the unit is local to.
Key.Russian: Установить на каком устройстве заспавнить юнита.

Key.Original: Should units spawn in the entire area of the synced trigger or only around the player.
Key.English: Should units spawn in the entire area of the synced trigger or only around the player.
Key.Russian: Будут ли юниты спавниться по всей площади синхронизированного триггера или только вокруг игрока.

Key.Original: Mode of operation with synchronized mutant modules
Key.English: Mode of operation with synchronized mutant modules
Key.Russian: Режим работы с синхронизированными модулями мутантов

Key.Original: Next activation timeout of synchronized triggers
Key.English: Next activation timeout of synchronized triggers

Key.Original: Count of units for each synced trigger
Key.English: Count of units for each synced trigger
Key.Russian: Количество юнитов для каждого синхронизированного триггера

Key.Original: For all or for each player in trigger, works only if the "Update at losses" setting is greater than 0%
Key.English: For all or for each player in trigger, works only if the "Update at losses" setting is greater than 0%
Key.Russian: Общее или для каждого игрока в триггере, работает только если настройка "Обновлять при потерях" больше 0%

Key.Original: Grouped units in the same group
Key.English: Grouped units in the same group

Key.Original: (meters) Maximum distance of psy-attack to victim
Key.English: (meters) Maximum distance of psy-attack to victim

Key.Original: Percentage of randomization count units of this type for each synced trigger
Key.English: Percentage of randomization count units of this type for each synced trigger
Key.Russian: Процент рандомизации количества юнитов этого типа для каждого синхронизированного триггера

Key.Original: The minimum percentage of the number of units
Key.English: The minimum percentage of the number of units

Key.Original: Percentage of radius spawn area relatively the area synchronized trigger
Key.English: Percentage of radius spawn area relatively the area synchronized trigger
Key.Russian: Процент радиуса порождения от области синхронизированного триггера

Key.Original: Delay (min.) To update the count of units ("Update at losses" setting)
Key.English: Delay (min.) To update the count of units ("Update at losses" setting)
Key.Russian: Задержка (мин.) для обновления количества юнитов (настройка "Обновлять при потерях")

Key.Original: Delay (sec.) for delete body after died or by deactivating synchronized trigger
Key.English: Delay (sec.) for delete body after died or by deactivating synchronized trigger
Key.Russian: Задержка (cек.) на удаление тела после смерти или по деактивации синхронизированного триггера

Key.Original: The time period for the appearance
Key.English: The time period for the appearance

Key.Original: The tactfulness of the unit. Fully affects the model of behavior (not only own forces are taken into account, but also the balance of forces)
Key.English: The tactfulness of the unit. Fully affects the model of behavior (not only own forces are taken into account, but also the balance of forces)
Key.Russian: Тактичнеость юнита. Влияет полностью на модель поведения (учитываются не только собственные силы, но и соотношение сил)

Key.Original: Unit сourage. Used in calculating aspect ratio forces. The value indicates how the unit evaluates its strength in relation to that of the enemy
Key.English: Unit сourage. Used in calculating aspect ratio forces. The value indicates how the unit evaluates its strength in relation to that of the enemy
Key.Russian: Храбрость юнита. Использутся в расчете сил соотношения сторон. Значение указывает как юнит оценивает свои силы по отношению к силам противника

Key.Original: Unit cowardice, affects most calculations (INSPECT, FOLLOW, AGGRESSIVE)
Key.English: Unit cowardice, affects most calculations (INSPECT, FOLLOW, AGGRESSIVE)
Key.Russian: Трусливость юнита, влияет на большинство расчётов (INSPECT, FOLLOW, AGGRESSIVE)

Key.Original: Unit curiosity, used in calculating the behavior of events that do not directly threaten the unit (INSPECT)
Key.English: Unit curiosity, used in calculating the behavior of events that do not directly threaten the unit (INSPECT)
Key.Russian: Любопытность юнита, используется в расчёте поведения при событиях напрямую не угрожающие юниту (INSPECT)

Key.Original: Unit stealth, used in calculating enemy contact behavior (SECRECY)
Key.English: Unit stealth, used in calculating enemy contact behavior (SECRECY)
Key.Russian: Скрытность юнита, используется в расчёте поведения при контакте с врагом (SECRECY)

Key.Original: Reflects the overall aggressiveness of the unit. Affects most calculations (INSPECT, FOLLOW, SECRECY)
Key.English: Reflects the overall aggressiveness of the unit. Affects most calculations (INSPECT, FOLLOW, SECRECY)
Key.Russian: Отражает общую агрессивность юнита. Влияет на большинство расчётов (INSPECT, FOLLOW, SECRECY)

Key.Original: The sociality of the unit affects the choice of the unit's waypoint at rest, as well as the choice of the victim in the combat state (GROUPMANEUVER).
Key.English: The sociality of the unit affects the choice of the unit's waypoint at rest, as well as the choice of the victim in the combat state (GROUPMANEUVER).
Key.Russian: Социальность юнита, влияет на выбор маршрутной точки юнита в состоянии покоя, а так же выбор жертвы в состоянии боя (GROUPMANEUVER)
